comments:
Multiline build errors are not marshalled correctly from the RemoteAntBuildLogger.

Results in truncated error message.

Please verify.
Easiest to see the changes in the output for the following buildfile (bad task):
<project default="noTask">
<target name="noTask">
<junitg></junitg>
</target>
</project>
